job_details.title: Senior AI Engineer
job_details.description:
Job Purpose 
We are seeking a dynamic AI Engineer to join our pioneering Conversational Text AI team. The ideal candidate will possess a strong foundation in model development, UI development and development of APIs, multi-system integrations. You will be involved in end-to-end stage of development life cycle.

 Duties and Responsibilities 
Deliveries with respect to Conversational Text AI Platform:
Build and maintain Conversational Text AI system using state-of-the-art LLM frameworks.
Collaborate with product owners and domain experts to build reusable components for business process.
Develop core infrastructure and reusable components to support the deployment of conversational AI systems.
Work on orchestration, prompt engineering, and LLM-powered integrations.
Implement scalable solutions integrated with respective echo systems and enterprise data platforms.
Contribute to the design of modular, extensible, enterprise-grade architectures.
Fine-tune & optimization for speed, accuracy, performance and maintainability across business units.
Contribute to CI/CD automation and maintain operational stability of application services.
Generative AI & Model Optimization:
Fine-tune LLMs/SLMs with proprietary NBFC data.
Perform distillation, quantization of LLMs for edge deployment.
Evaluate and run LLM/SLM models on local/edge server machines.
Self-Learning Frameworks:
Build self-learning systems that adapt without full retraining (e.g., learn new rejection patterns from calls).
Implement lightweight local models to enable real-time learning on the edge.

 Key Decisions / Dimensions 
Platform Design & Delivery, Model Selection, Customization (if any) & Testing:
Choosing the right model for various task and actions.
Selecting appropriate model so that tasks can complete in efficient manner.
Defining reusable components in the platform. Delivery using configuration approach should be first preference, in case that does not work should go for customization.
Defining configuration parameters and incorporate them as platform design.
Testing and end to end testing of the project deliverable.
Load balancing between different models.
Always have switch on/switch off feature.
Must have all services backed up on primary/HA & DR servers.
Prompt Engineering:
Prompt Design & DevelopmentCrafting prompts that guide AI systems to produce desired outputs for various applications, such as text generation, translation, question answering, and creative writing.
Testing and EvaluationAnalysing the effectiveness of prompts and refining them based on results to ensure accurate and relevant responses.
Bias MitigationDesigning prompts that minimize bias and ensure fair and equitable outcomes from AI systems.

 Major Challenges 
Support from other platform owners
Building a Conversational Text AI BOT that doesn''t just answer but negotiates with human-like reasoning.
Running large AI models in low-latency, low-bandwidth environments without cloud dependency.
Getting the end-to-end domain knowledge
Managing data and information security of the application.

 Required Qualifications and Experience 
Educational Qualifications
Educational BackgroundBachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
Experience4
7 years of experience in AI/ML, with exposure to Python, Node.JS, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Redis, Postgres, Azure COSMOS, DevOps, CI/CD.
Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, Node.JS, JavaScript, HTML/CSS.
Familiarity with Redis, Postgres, Vector Embeddings, Speech-to-Text & Text-to-Speech Services, Azure COSMOS, DevOps, CI/CD, Lang-Chain or Lang-Graph.
Experience building with or integrating LLMs for task automation, reasoning, or autonomous workflows
Strong understanding of prompt engineering, tool calling, and agent orchestration.

job_details.title: Senior AI Engineer
job_details.description:
Senior AI Engineer
Pune, India


About Us
Coditation was founded by a serial entrepreneur, and a team of young talented technologists with a vision of delivering high-quality, scalable, and best-in-class products at the bleeding edge of technology . We specialize in Machine Learning & AI, Data Engineering, Cloud, and Enterprise Mobility. We have built a team of ninja architects, data scientists, data engineers, and software engineers having decades of collective experience of applying emerging technologies to build cutting edge software products, and are constantly looking to add high-quality and passionate engineers.


What we are looking for
We are Seeking a Senior AI Engineer to serve as an embedded technical expert within a client s engineering team. You will be a key member of the team developing and optimizing advanced, AI-driven solutions for a code modernization platform. This role requires a blend of critical thinking and hands-on development skills to build modular Python systems that leverage state management, workflow orchestration, and large language models (LLMs) to modernize complex software systems.


What would your day look like
Agentic & Workflow Engineering: Design and implement modular Python systems using LangGraph and LangChain to manage state, configuration, and complex workflow orchestration.
Code Modernization: Design AI workflows for reverse and forward engineering, including code analysis, summarization, and dependency transformation.
RAG & Vector Operations: Build and maintain high-performance Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines and database operations for storing dependency matrices and workflow results.
Multi-LLM Integration: Integrate and optimize various LLMs (e.g., Gemini, Claude, GPT-4, Vertex AI) for code analysis and automated generation.
Database Management: Manage data persistence using PostgreSQL with the pgvector extension, including schema management and efficient similarity searches.
Robust Tooling: Develop utilities for file handling, model operations, and ensuring robust logging and error handling across applications. What you will need
Collaboration: Work as a seamless member of the client s team, collaborating with leads and architects to define requirements and deliver scalable AI solutions.
Quality Standards: Write and maintain comprehensive unit and integration tests for all major components while adhering to Pythonic best practices.
Agile Governance: Participate in SAFe Agile ceremonies and maintain meticulous project tracking and documentation in JIRA for internal and external stakeholders.


Technical Skills:
Core AI Frameworks: Expert proficiency in LangChain, LangGraph, and agentic AI development; deep understanding of tokenization and prompt engineering.
Programming & Patterns: 5+ years of professional Python development with deep knowledge of packages like PyYAML, python-dotenv, SQLAlchemy, and psycopg2.
Data & Vector Search: Strong background in SQL/NoSQL, specifically PostgreSQL and vector embedding concepts.
Modern Dev Stack: Expert use of VS Code, Git for version control, and YAML/JSON for configuration management.


Preferred Pluses:
Experience with Knowledge Graphs.
Familiarity with Java and React tech stacks for cross-language workflows.
Prior experience in insurance, finance, or regulated enterprise environments.

job_details.title: Senior AI Engineer
job_details.description:
Job Purpose
We are seeking a dynamic AI Engineer to join our pioneering Conversational Text AI team. The ideal candidate will possess a strong foundation in model development, UI development and development of APIs, multi-system integrations. You will be involved in end-to-end stage of development life cycle.

Duties and Responsibilities
Deliveries with respect to Conversational Text AI Platform:

Build and maintain Conversational Text AI system using state-of-the-art LLM frameworks.

Collaborate with product owners and domain experts to build reusable components for business process.

Develop core infrastructure and reusable components to support the deployment of conversational AI systems.

Work on orchestration, prompt engineering, and LLM-powered integrations.

Implement scalable solutions integrated with respective echo systems and enterprise data platforms.

Contribute to the design of modular, extensible, enterprise-grade architectures.

Fine-tune & optimization for speed, accuracy, performance and maintainability across business units.

Contribute to CI/CD automation and maintain operational stability of application services.
Generative AI & Model Optimization:

Fine-tune LLMs/SLMs with proprietary NBFC data.

Perform distillation, quantization of LLMs for edge deployment.

Evaluate and run LLM/SLM models on local/edge server machines.
Self-Learning Frameworks:

Build self-learning systems that adapt without full retraining (e.g., learn new rejection patterns from calls).

Implement lightweight local models to enable real-time learning on the edge.


Key Decisions / Dimensions
Platform Design & Delivery, Model Selection, Customization (if any) & Testing:

Choosing the right model for various task and actions.

Selecting appropriate model so that tasks can complete in efficient manner.

Defining reusable components in the platform. Delivery using configuration approach should be first preference, in case that does not work should go for customization.

Defining configuration parameters and incorporate them as platform design.

Testing and end to end testing of the project deliverable.

Load balancing between different models.

Always have switch on/switch off feature.

Must have all services backed up on primary/HA & DR servers.
Prompt Engineering:

Prompt Design & Development: Crafting prompts that guide AI systems to produce desired outputs for various applications, such as text generation, translation, question answering, and creative writing.

Testing and Evaluation: Analysing the effectiveness of prompts and refining them based on results to ensure accurate and relevant responses.

Bias Mitigation: Designing prompts that minimize bias and ensure fair and equitable outcomes from AI systems.


Major Challenges

Support from other platform owners

Building a Conversational Text AI BOT that doesn't just answer but negotiates with human-like reasoning.

Running large AI models in low-latency, low-bandwidth environments without cloud dependency.

Getting the end-to-end domain knowledge

Managing data and information security of the application.


Required Qualifications and Experience
Educational Qualifications

Educational Background: Bachelors or Masters degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.

Experience: 47 years of experience in AI/ML, with exposure to Python, Node.JS, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Redis, Postgres, Azure COSMOS, DevOps, CI/CD.

Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, Node.JS, JavaScript, HTML/CSS.

Familiarity with Redis, Postgres, Vector Embeddings, Speech-to-Text & Text-to-Speech Services, Azure COSMOS, DevOps, CI/CD, Lang-Chain or Lang-Graph.

Experience building with or integrating LLMs for task automation, reasoning, or autonomous workflows

Strong understanding of prompt engineering, tool calling, and agent orchestration.

job_details.title: Principal Data Scientist/Sr Data Scientist - NLP/Machine Learning
job_details.description:
Job Position :

Principal Data Scientist / Sr Data Scientists /Data Scientist / Jr. Data Scientist / Data Science Intern / Machine Learning Engineer-Global Tech AI Health Startup.


Joining : Immediately.


Job Location : Delhi NCR, India.

Global HQ, Benovymed Global Technology Development and Innovation Center & Benovymed Global R and D, and AI Health Innovation Center in Delhi NCR.


Job Role Responsibility Description :

We are looking for passionate, Strong experience with an entrepreneur mindset to join us as Hardcore Full Stack Data Scientist end-to-end single-handed multi-hat role who is already working in applied AI in ML, deep Learning, ANN, and CNN platform specifically working as single-handed doers or in a small Data Science Team with full end to end ownership of Data Science work commitment delivery as Data Scientist working in any reputed AI Data Science is driven Tech startup preferably in Healthcare.

Required Skillsets :

- Needs to have statistical, mathematical, and predictive modeling as well as business strategy skills to build the algorithms necessary to ask the right questions and find the right answers.

- Need to be able to communicate their findings, orally and visually.

- Need to understand how the products are developed and even more important, as big data touches the privacy of consumers, they need to have a set of ethical responsibilities.-

- Need to have a natural desire to go beneath the surface of a problem.

- Confident and self-secure as they more often than not will have to deal with situations where there is a lot of unknown.

- Good knowledge & experience in Artificial Neural Network ( ANN ), AI conversational Chatbot & Needs to be able to write the required Algorithm and coding programming.

- Preferably in different programming languages such as Python, Tensor Flow, Keras, AWS (ML and DL), Numpy, and Pytorch.

In addition the need to be familiar with disciplines as follows :

- Natural Language Processing, Machine learning, Conceptual modeling, Statistical analysis, Predictive Modeling, and Hypothesis testing.

Data scientists should have at least some of the following capabilities :

- Cleaning data, formatting data, Having the ability to query databases & perform statistical analysis, building AI Data Modelling, validating the AI Model, and deployment.

- Being able to develop or program databases.

- Having a good understanding of design & architecture principles.


Qualification :

B.Tech / M.Tech in CSE / Electrical / Electronics & Communication/ Maths & Computing /Statistics /BioTech/BioStat / Clinical Engineering in Data Science / Machine Learning from Top-rated Tech University / Top rated IIT /IIIT.


Mandatory Requirement :

Experience :

- Post last qualification of at least 0 to 7 Years of strong experience exclusive in real Industry Projects in applied AI ML & Deep Learning Data Science in an early-stage AI Health startup at the role and designation as a single-handed full-stack Principal Data Scientist / Sr. Data Scientist.

- Hardcore in ANN /Deep Learning /Machine Learning/NLP with at least 2-20 good Applied AI-oriented Applied Research Projects & applications with hardcore experience working on ANN, CNN, RNN, and deep learning in Digital Health startups to solve specific complex problems.


CTC :

- Best Package in Industry.

- Terms & Conditions Apply as per our organization.

- To deserving eligible candidates only, the company Equity / ESOP may be given also as a part of a Package for a long-term career opportunity.

- Apply with your CV with passport size photo, & current CTC, expected CTC, Notice Period, Project details & cover letter.

job_details.title: Data Scientist-Artificial Intelligence
job_details.description:
As an Associate Data Scientist at IBM, you will work to solve business problems using leading edge and open-source tools such as Python, R, and TensorFlow, combined with IBM tools and our AI application suites. You will prepare, analyze, and understand data to deliver insight, predict emerging trends, and provide recommendations to stakeholders. In your role, you may be responsible for:
Implementing and validating predictive and prescriptive models and creating and maintaining statistical models with a focus on big data & incorporating machine learning. techniques in your projects
Writing programs to cleanse and integrate data in an efficient and reusable manner
Working in an Agile, collaborative environment, partnering with other scientists, engineers, consultants and database administrators of all backgrounds and disciplines to bring analytical rigor and statistical methods to the challenges of predicting behaviors
Communicating with internal and external clients to understand and define business needs and appropriate modelling techniques to provide analytical solutions.
Evaluating modelling results and communicating the results to technical and non-technical audiences.
Required education
Bachelor's Degree
Required technical and professional expertise
Proof of Concept (POC) Development: Develop POCs to validate and showcase the feasibility and effectiveness of the proposed AI solutions.
Collaborate with development teams to implement and iterate on POCs, ensuring alignment with customer requirements and expectations.
Help in showcasing the ability of Gen AI code assistant to refactor/rewrite and document code from one language to another, particularly COBOL to JAVA through rapid prototypes/ PoC
Document solution architectures, design decisions, implementation details, and lessons learned.
Create technical documentation, white papers, and best practice guides
Preferred technical and professional experience
Strong programming skills, with proficiency in Python and experience with AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras or Hugging Face.
Understanding in the usage of libraries such as SciKit Learn, Pandas, Matplotlib, etc. Familiarity with cloud platforms
Experience and working knowledge in COBOL & JAVA would be preferred
Experience in python and pyspark will be added advantage

job_details.title: Senior Python / AI Engineer
job_details.description:
Project description

Our client, one of the leading Agriculture Companies, is modernising their landscape and adopting AI and innovations in their process. Role Description
Join our innovative team as a Senior AI Engineer, where you will be instrumental in the end-to-end design, development, and deployment of cutting-edge AI solutions.
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated individual to expertly leverage advanced AI models and platforms, tackling complex business challenges, and driving digital transformation.
You will lead projects ranging from intelligent automation to advanced conversational AI, utilizing a modern technology stack to create impactful and scalable applications.
This role offers a significant opportunity to be at the forefront of AI innovation, contributing directly to solutions that redefine user experiences and operational efficiencies, and to guide and mentor a team of talented engineers.
What we ll offer you
As part of our flexible scheme, here are just some of the benefits that you ll enjoy:
Best in class leave policy
Gender neutral parental leaves
100% reimbursement under childcare assistance benefit (gender neutral)
Sponsorship for Industry relevant certifications and education
Employee Assistance Program for you and your family members
Comprehensive Hospitalization Insurance for you and your dependents
Accident and Term life Insurance
Complementary Health screening for 35 yrs. and above
Your Key Responsibilities
AI Solution Architecture Development: Lead the end-to-end design, development, and implementation of robust AI-powered applications and services utilizing Python, FastAPI/Flask, and Google VertexAI.
Advanced AI Model Management: Expertly integrate and fine-tune large language models, with a specific focus on the Gemini Model, for a diverse range of NLP tasks and generative AI applications.
Conversational Agentic AI Systems: Architect and enhance sophisticated conversational AI agents, and implement cutting-edge Agentic AI patterns and orchestrate complex AI workflows using frameworks like ADK and LangGraph.
System Integration Infrastructure: Design and implement seamless API integrations with various internal and external systems. Lead the deployment and management of AI solutions on cloud platforms like GCP (CloudRun/GKE, BigQuery, CloudSQL) and Openshift.

Develop and execute comprehensive test strategies for AI solutions, and oversee the deployment and monitoring of models in production environments using CI/CD and AgentOps best practices.
Strategic Growth Collaboration: Proactively stay current with the latest advancements in AI/ML and propose innovative solutions. Work closely with product managers, data scientists, and other engineering teams to ensure the successful delivery of high-quality AI products.

Agentic AI Orchestration: Solid understanding of Agentic AI principles and frameworks like ADK and LangGraph.
Database: Strong experience in writing medium to complex SQL queries.
Cloud DevOps:
Cloud Platforms: Strong experience with GCP services (CloudRun/GKE, BigQuery, CloudSQL) and exposure to Openshift.
DevOps CI/CD: Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, Github Actions, Teamcity), Sonar, JIRA, and a strong understanding of DevOps and AgentOps practices.
Leadership Soft Skills:
Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to articulate technical concepts clearly to diverse stakeholders.
Collaboration: A strong team player with the ability to work in virtual teams and matrixed organizations.
Problem-Solving: Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities with a strong attention to detail.

job_details.description:
About The Role  



Project Role :AI / ML Engineer




Project Role Description :Develops applications and systems that utilize AI tools, Cloud AI services, with proper cloud or on-prem application pipeline with production ready quality. Be able to apply GenAI models as part of the solution. Could also include but not limited to deep learning, neural networks, chatbots, image processing.


Must have skills :Large Language Models



Good to have skills :NA
Minimum

3 year(s) of experience is required



Educational Qualification :15 years full time education

SUMMARY:We are looking for a technical enthusiast with strong expertise in Python and a solid understanding of AI/ML concepts to contribute to the development of Data Agents powered by Agentic AI. The ideal AI enthusiast will play a key role in designing, implementing, and optimizing intelligent agents that can autonomously process data, interact with systems, and support business decision-making. ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
Design & Development:Build and deploy intelligent Data Agents using Agentic AI frameworks and Python-based development to enable autonomous decision-making.
Data Engineering:Implement scalable and efficient data pipelines leveraging Python/Py Spark to support AI-driven workflows and analytics.
AI/ML Integration:Apply advanced AI/ML concepts within Data Agents to enable automation, reasoning, and intelligent decision support.
Prompt Engineering:Develop and optimize prompts to improve performance of large language models (LLMs) and enhance agentic workflows.
Cross-functional Collaboration:Partner with product, data science, and engineering teams to identify business use cases and deliver AI-powered solutions.
Innovation & Enhancement:Continuously refine agent capabilities to improve adaptability, efficiency, and accuracy in dynamic business environments. TECHNICAL EXPERIENCE:
Min 2.5 years of professional experience in the required skills - having min 1 year of Gen AI experience
Proficiency in Python, Knowledge Graphs, and experience with Py Spark for data handling.
Foundational understanding of AI/ML concepts (e.g., supervised/unsupervised learning, NLP, LLMs).
Growth mindset and agility to adapt in a rapidly evolving AI landscape.
Experience with ETL/ELT pipelines.
Proficiency in different types of database modeling (relational, NoSQL, graph, etc.).
Experience building APIs (e.g., Fast API) and Server-Sent Events (SSE).
Knowledge of search technologies, including Elasticsearch, vectorization, and embeddings.
Experience developing modern frontends using Angular or React frameworks.
Design and build Data Agents leveraging Agentic AI frameworks and Python-based development.
Implement scalable data pipelines using Python/Py Spark to support AI-driven workflows.
Integrate AI/ML concepts into Data Agents for automation, reasoning, and decision support.
Apply prompt engineering techniques to optimize performance of LLMs and agentic workflows.
Collaborate with product, data science, and engineering teams to identify use cases and deliver AI-enabled solutions.
Continuously enhance agent capabilities to improve adaptability, accuracy, and efficiency.
Stay ahead of emerging technologies in Agentic AI, ML, and autonomous systems to drive innovation.
Strong problem-solving mindset, with the ability to build and adapt intelligent systems.
Excellent communication skills to articulate technical ideas to cross-functional teams. ADDITIONAL ATTRIBUTES:
Familiarity with LLMs and frameworks for building agentic workflows.
Hands-on experience with ML frameworks such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or Py Torch.
Understanding of cloud-based AI services (AWS SageMaker, Azure ML, GCP Vertex AI). EDUCATION QUALIFICATIONS:
A 15-year full-time education is required

 Qualification 15 years full time education

job_details.title: Principal Architect (Data Architect), Applied AI Engineering
job_details.description:
Data Architecture Modeling
Design conceptual, logical, and physical data models for transactional, analytical, and AI-driven systems.
Define architecture for Microsoft Fabric Lakehouse/Data Warehouse and integration with existing Azure SQL and Blob storage.
Establish standards for schema design, partitioning, and indexing for performance and scalability.
Platform Strategy Governance
Develop and enforce data architecture principles, governance policies, and security standards.
Define lineage, cataloging, and metadata management strategies.
Ensure compliance with regulatory and enterprise data privacy requirements.
Integration Interoperability
Architect data flows between operational systems, Fabric, and downstream analytics tools (Power BI, AI pipelines).
Design APIs and middleware for seamless integration with ERP/CRM systems and AI services.
Enable RAG-based AI workflows by structuring data for embeddings and semantic search.
Performance Optimization
Define strategies for query optimization, caching, and distributed processing.
Recommend storage tiers and cost-optimized architecture for multi-tenant and single-tenant deployments.
Collaboration Leadership
Work closely with Data Engineers, DevOps, and CloudOps teams to implement architecture.
Provide technical leadership and mentoring for data modeling and best practices.
Partner with product teams to align architecture with roadmap and business goals.
Principal Architect to design and Architect AI products.
BE
Strong expertise in data architecture for cloud platforms (Azure preferred).
Hands-on experience with Microsoft Fabric, Azure Data Factory, Synapse, and Delta Lake concepts.
Proficiency in SQL, data modeling, and ETL/ELT design.
Knowledge of data governance, security, and compliance frameworks.
Familiarity with Azure security, RBAC, and compliance frameworks.
Familiarity with AI/ML data preparation, embeddings, and vector database technologies
Understanding of Power BI semantic modeling and advanced analytics integration.
Bachelor s or Master s in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or related field.
15+ years of experience in data architecture roles with enterprise-scale systems.
Nice to have:
Experience with multi-tenant SaaS architectures and large-scale data systems.
Exposure to GenAI/LLM integration and RAG-based architectures.
Knowledge of CI/CD for data pipelines and DataOps practices


We are seeking a Data Architect to define and govern the architecture for enterprise-scale data platforms supporting advanced analytics, AI/ML workloads, and Microsoft Fabric-based data warehousing. This role will ensure robust, secure, and scalable data solutions that enable deep research, dynamic reporting, and AI-driven insights across contracting data ecosystems.

job_details.description:
FULL-STACK AI ENGINEER (Python)




We're seeking a versatile Full-Stack AI Solutions Engineer. You'll be part of our AI Productization team, working across the entire technology stack to deliver custom AI solutions that make a real impact.

Youll grow expertise across multiple domains while contributing to research and AI implementation from concept to deployment.




Role & responsibilities

Build full-stack applications: design and develop GenAI-based applications, RAG systems and agentic workflow automations.
Research and integrate: looking for the most effective solutions to business problems, integrating existing products and frameworks, along with a wide range of our customers internal and external systems.
Own the roadmap: shape the project from its concept to production deployment, ensuring high quality standards, impact and business value.
Productionalize your solution: broaden your technology expertise by setting up infrastructure on major cloud providers, leveraging new managed services for AI/AIOps/MLOps, solving challenging setups (e.g. LLMs on-premise)
Support AI adoption: be at heart of AI adoption among our customers, creating UI/UX prototypes of the brand-new solutions and products, proving the value and feasibility.

University degree in Computer Science or related technical field
2+ years professional expertise with software engineering and Devops
Proficiency in full-stack development in Python and React
Hands-on experience with DevOps in cloud infrastructure (Azure, AWS), CI/CD pipelines
Experience with database management (SQL and/or noSQL)
A strong understanding of security best practices and performance optimization for scalable products
Self-motivated with an ownership mindset to take initiative and deliver results in a fast-paced environment.




Nice to have:



Experience with AI tools, frameworks, and APIs (e.g., OpenAI, Hugging Face, LangChain).
Experience with No-code/Low-code AI tools, AI-enhanced development
Familiarity with integrating LLMs into practical use cases in real-world applications.
Experience with Infrastructure as a Code solutions such as Terraform
Certifications in cloud platforms like Azure of AWS.

job_details.title: AI Engineering, Vice President
job_details.description:
Your Team Responsibilities
We're seeking an exceptional Principal AI Engineer to join our AI team and shape the development of cutting-edge solutions that address MSCI's most complex analytical challenges
In this role, you'll architect and implement advanced AI systems that transform how global investors make critical decisions by providing sophisticated insights across financial markets, risk assessment, and portfolio analytics
The ideal candidate brings deep expertise in AI/ML, proven experience in delivering enterprise-scale AI solutions, and a passion for leveraging technology to solve multifaceted problems in the financial data ecosystem

As a senior individual contributor, you'll work closely with cross-functional teams to design innovative AI-powered platforms that process vast amounts of heterogeneous data, generate actionable insights, and enable data-driven decision-making at scale
You'll serve as a technical expert, establishing best practices and driving the adoption of state-of-the-art AI technologies while ensuring our solutions meet the rigorous standards required by institutional investors globally

This role offers the unique opportunity to work on diverse, high-impact AI applications that shape how the world's largest financial institutions understand and navigate complex market dynamics

Your Key Responsibilities
Design and implement enterprise-scale AI architectures for processing and analyzing complex, multi-dimensional financial and alternative data
Architect end-to-end ML pipelines that handle multi-modal data sources including structured market data, unstructured documents, and real-time feeds
Develop advanced NLP systems for extracting and validating critical metrics from millions of documents, reports, and regulatory filings
Apply cutting-edge AI techniques (including LLMs, computer vision, and deep learning) to solve MSCI's diverse AI use cases
Implement MLOps best practices and automated systems for model deployment, monitoring, and continuous improvement across multiple product lines
Collaborate with product teams and domain experts to translate complex requirements into scalable technical solutions
Provide technical guidance and mentorship to other engineers on AI/ML best practices and architectural decisions
Partner with MSCI Research teams to advance the state of AI applications in financial analytics
Drive technical excellence through code reviews, design documentation, and knowledge sharing across the organization
Help improve AI Engg team's productivty by using AI agents to automate tasks
Your Skills And Experience That Will Help You Excel
10+ years of experience building and deploying AI/ML systems at scale, with deep hands-on technical expertise
Expert-level proficiency in modern AI/ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch) and distributed computing platforms (Flink, Beam, Spark, Ray)
Proven track record of architecting and delivering enterprise AI platforms handling large scale data
Advanced knowledge of NLP, computer vision, and time-series analysis techniques with practical application experience
Experience with financial data, risk modeling, or quantitative analytics is highly desirable
Expertise in building real-time streaming architectures using technologies like Kafka, Flink, or Beam
Strong foundation in MLOps practices including model versioning, A/B testing, and automated retraining pipelines
Proficiency in cloud platforms (GCP, Azure) and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
Excellent technical communication skills with ability to present complex AI concepts to diverse stakeholders
Track record of publishing research or speaking at conferences on AI/ML topics
Passion for solving complex analytical challenges and using technology to drive innovation in financial markets
About MSCI
What we offer you
Transparent compensation schemes and comprehensive employee benefits, tailored to your location, ensuring your financial security, health, and overall wellbeing

Flexible working arrangements, advanced technology, and collaborative workspaces

A culture of high performance and innovation where we experiment with new ideas and take responsibility for achieving results

A global network of talented colleagues, who inspire, support, and share their expertise to innovate and deliver for our clients

Global Orientation program to kickstart your journey, followed by access to our Learning@MSCI platform, LinkedIn Learning Pro and tailored learning opportunities for ongoing skills development

Multi-directional career paths that offer professional growth and development through new challenges, internal mobility and expanded roles

We actively nurture an environment that builds a sense of inclusion belonging and connection, including eight Employee Resource Groups
All Abilities, Asian Support Network, Black Leadership Network, Climate Action Network, Hola! MSCI, Pride & Allies, Women in Tech, and Womens Leadership Forum

At MSCI we are passionate about what we do, and we are inspired by our purpose to power better investment decisions
Youll be part of an industry-leading network of creative, curious, and entrepreneurial pioneers
This is a space where you can challenge yourself, set new standards and perform beyond expectations for yourself, our clients, and our industry

MSCI is a leading provider of critical decision support tools and services for the global investment community
With over 50 years of expertise in research, data, and technology, we power better investment decisions by enabling clients to understand and analyze key drivers of risk and return and confidently build more effective portfolios
We create industry-leading research-enhanced solutions that clients use to gain insight into and improve transparency across the investment process

MSCI Inc
is an equal opportunity employer
It is the policy of the firm to ensure equal employment opportunity without discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, religion, creed, age, sex, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, citizenship, disability, marital and civil partnership/union status, pregnancy (including unlawful discrimination on the basis of a legally protected parental leave), veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law
MSCI is also committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities
If you are an individual with a disability and would like to request a reasonable accommodation for any part of the application process, please email Disability
Assistance@msci and indicate the specifics of the assistance needed
Please note, this e-mail is intended only for individuals who are requesting a reasonable workplace accommodation; it is not intended for other inquiries

To all recruitment agencies
MSCI does not accept unsolicited CVs/Resumes
Please do not forward CVs/Resumes to any MSCI employee, location, or website
MSCI is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited CVs/Resumes

Note on recruitment scams
We are aware of recruitment scams where fraudsters impersonating MSCI personnel may try and elicit personal information from job seekers
Read our full note on careers

job_details.title: Senior AI Engineer
job_details.description:
Job Description
We are seeking an experienced Senior AI Engineer with deep expertise in designing and building advanced AI/ML systems, Large Language Models (LLMs), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and agent-based architectures. This role is ideal for a highly skilled technologist with 10+ years of software development experience (including 3+ years in AI/ML) who thrives at the intersection of systems engineering, cloud infrastructure, and cutting-edge AI and machine learning applications.
As a Senior AI Engineer, you will architect, implement, and optimize AI-driven solutions for enterprise-scale environments. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional engineering, product, and research teams to integrate intelligent features into products and services. You will also play a key role in operationalizing AI systems, ensuring reliability, security, and performance at scale.
The Senior AI Engineer is a systems-oriented innovator who is passionate about building reliable AI platforms, pushing the boundaries of applied AI, and driving measurable business value through innovation.
Key Requirements Responsibilities
Design and Develop AI Systems: Design, build, and optimize advanced AI solutions including LLMs, RAG pipelines, and agent-based architectures.
Operationalize AI Agents: Deploy, orchestrate, and manage multi-agent systems for enterprise-scale use cases, leveraging standards and frameworks like MCP, LangChain Agents, CrewAI, AutoGen, or A2A/ADK.
Agent Lifecycle Management: Establish practices for agent state management, role coordination, monitoring, retraining, and rollback to ensure reliability and accountability.
Autonomy Guardrails: Implement policies, controls, and observability to bound agent behavior, prevent runaway actions, and align with Responsible AI standards.
Integration Architecture: Connect agents with APIs, microservices, and message-driven systems to orchestrate seamless collaboration across agents, humans, and enterprise services.
Responsible AI Security: Apply governance, fairness, security, and compliance controls to ensure safe, ethical, and regulatory-aligned agent operations.
Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Partner with product managers, designers, and engineers to co-create AI features that deliver business value and improve user experience.
Drive Continuous Innovation: Stay ahead of emerging trends in AI engineering, evaluate and adopt emerging tools/frameworks to strengthen the AI platform strategy.
Be familiar with corporate security policies and follow the guidance set out by processes and procedures of Assent.Qualifications
We strongly value your talent, energy and passion. It will also be valuable to Assent if you have the following qualifications
Master s or Bachelor s degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering.
Industry Experience: 8+ years of professional software development, including 3+ years in AI/ML systems (LLMs, RAG, agent-based architectures).
Programming Excellence: Expert-level coding skills in Python, C# and Angular/JavaScript, and experience with coding assistants.
Agentic AI Tooling: Hands-on experience with standards and frameworks such as MCP, A2A/ADK, LangChain, CrewAI, and AutoGen.
Cloud Expertise: Strong working knowledge of AWS (preferred), Azure, or GCP; comfort with cloud-native services for LLM workloads.
Systems Thinking: Deep understanding of event-driven architectures, distributed systems, message brokers (Kafka, Rabbitmq, Solace PubSub+), and microservices.
DevOps Fluency: Familiarity with CI/CD, Docker, and infrastructure-as-code; able to collaborate with DevOps teams to ensure scalable and reliable agent operations.
Responsible AI Awareness: Understanding of AI security, fairness, governance, and compliance frameworks.
Product Orientation: Ability to translate business challenges into AI/ML solutions, define use cases, and engage in early-stage ideation and problem-solving.
Collaboration Communication: Strong ability to engage with cross-functional teams, influencing product direction while articulating technical trade-offs.
Innovation Mindset: Curiosity and passion for applying emerging AI/ML techniques to enterprise integration challenges.

job_details.title: Senior AI Engineer
job_details.description:
ql-editor ">
Making a difference and driving positive change is what we do every day at Rapid Circle. Our Cloud Pioneers help our clients in their digital transformation. Are you someone who goes for constant, positive changeThen this vacancy is for you!


As a Cloud Pioneer at Rapid Circle, you will work with our customers on different projects. For example, making impact in the healthcare sector, by making research data safely available. But also, awesome projects in the manufacturing or energy market make this job very challenging.
At Rapid Circle we are curious and are constantly improving our expertise to help customers find their way in a rapidly changing world. We share our knowledge and discover new ways to learn.


Rapid Circle is growing rapidly and are therefore looking for the right person for the role. You will be given lots of freedom to develop personally. We also have a lot of in-house knowledge (MVPs) within the Netherlands, Australia, and India. By working closely with your (international) colleagues, you can continue to challenge yourself and create your own growth path. Freedom, entrepreneurship, and development are key at Rapid Circle, so also in the role of a Power Platform Lead.


Qualifications & Requirements
Required:


3-8 years of professional experience in cloud/software engineering or DevOps.
Strong, hands-on expertise with core AWS services: IAM, VPC, S3, API Gateway, Lambda, ECS/EKS, CloudWatch, and KMS.
Practical, demonstrable experience with Microsoft Azure, specifically with Azure AI Foundry and Azure OpenAI.
Proven track record of delivering Generative AI solutions using OpenAI/Azure OpenAI and agentic frameworks (e.g., LangChain, OpenAI Assistants).
Solid expertise in building RAG systems, working with vector databases, and a clear understanding of LLM pricing and tuning options.
Proficiency in Python and FastAPI for backend development.
Experience with Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) using Terraform or AWS CDK.
Hands-on experience with CI/CD using GitHub Actions and a strong grasp of testing and code quality fundamentals.
Knowledge of identity and security management using Entra ID (Azure AD), OAuth2/OIDC, and secrets management patterns.


Good to Have:


Experience with LLM evaluation and observability tools (e.g., Weights & Biases, MLflow, LangSmith).
Knowledge of cross-cloud networking and compliance frameworks.
Relevant certifications are a significant plus:
Microsoft: Azure AI Engineer Associate or Azure Solutions Architect.
AWS: AWS Solutions Architect (Associate or Professional).

job_details.title: AI Engineering, Vice President
job_details.description:
Were seeking an exceptional Principal AI Engineer to join our AI team and shape the development of cutting-edge solutions that address MSCIs most complex analytical challenges.
In this role, youll architect and implement advanced AI systems that transform how global investors make critical decisions by providing sophisticated insights across financial markets, risk assessment, and portfolio analytics.
The ideal candidate brings deep expertise in AI/ML, proven experience in delivering enterprise-scale AI solutions, and a passion for leveraging technology to solve multifaceted problems in the financial data ecosystem.
As a senior individual contributor, youll work closely with cross-functional teams to design innovative AI-powered platforms that process vast amounts of heterogeneous data, generate actionable insights, and enable data-driven decision-making at scale.
Youll serve as a technical expert, establishing best practices and driving the adoption of state-of-the-art AI technologies while ensuring our solutions meet the rigorous standards required by institutional investors globally.
This role offers the unique opportunity to work on diverse, high-impact AI applications that shape how the worlds largest financial institutions understand and navigate complex market dynamics.
Your Key Responsibilities
Design and implement enterprise-scale AI architectures for processing and analyzing complex, multi-dimensional financial and alternative data
Architect end-to-end ML pipelines that handle multi-modal data sources including structured market data, unstructured documents, and real-time feeds
Develop advanced NLP systems for extracting and validating critical metrics from millions of documents, reports, and regulatory filings

job_details.title: Senior AI Engineer
job_details.description:
Job Description
Jitterbit is seeking Senior backend engineers to join our AI team. Jitterbit is an iPaaS (Integration as a Service), LCAP, and API Management platform which has been recognized in Gartner MQ for seven straight years. Our customers utilize our Low-code iPaaS, APIM, LCAP, and B2B platform to address mission-critical business automation challenges. What is our challengeTo make it easy to automate our customers systems. In order to do this, we need to build and create a SaaS offering that is reliable, stable, and scalable for our customers. Do you have the design, architecting, and code-writing capabilities to take on this challengeAnd can succeed in a big way
About the Team
The engineering team at Jitterbit believes that the quality of our code reflects directly on us as professionals. We are relentless about crafting a product that is innovative and delivers a memorable user experience; an experience that is fast and robust.
As a key engineer on our team, you will collaborate with other engineers, product management, and operations.
Our culture is fun, fast-paced, performance-oriented, open, and collegial. We are constantly pushing the technology envelope to the edge! We are very distributed, and our culture is set up to make all of us very effective working remotely. We believe in hiring talent where it exists.
About the Job
Join our team and play a crucial role in building, designing, and architecting AI capabilities on our cutting-edge platform. We seek a talented Senior AI Engineer to infuse our AI vision into our platform. Youll work with various technologies, including LLM, RAG, Azure AI, AWS Bedrock, OpenAI, LangChain, LlamaIndex, Python, Java, Nginx, Tomcat, Kafka, Elasticsearch, InfluxDB, Redis, MySQL, Linux, C++, Apache, Docker, and Kubernetes. Your mission will be to create robust, scalable AI systems that run seamlessly . This is a unique opportunity to innovate with the latest technologies and contribute to our market-leading position.
About You
Youre an engineer with a knack for turning ideas into highly reliable and scalable designs. Your coding skills make your work easy for other engineers to understand, modify, and enhance. You believe in the transformative power of Business Automation and are committed to integrating systems and building applications efficiently.
Qualifications
Success in this role requires:
Mentoring and helping others to grow as engineers and developers
Have excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to excel in a distributed, remote team environment
Self-drive to work on key initiatives
Take pleasure in making things happen and listen to the input from peers
Data-driven decision-making skills
Embracing a best-idea-wins approach, regardless of the source
Collaboration with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
Staying current with emerging trends and technologies in AI and cloud computing
We are looking for:
10+ years of experience in building large-scale cloud-based distributed applications
Strong experience in building multi-tenant SaaS applications
Expertise with AI technologies, including LLM models, RAG, LangChain, and LlamaIndex
Ability to design and develop scalable and robust AI-driven applications
Excellent problem-solving, debugging, and analytical skills with great attention to detail
Experience with microservices and cloud-based architectures/design patterns
Demonstrated proficiency in English at the C1 level
Technical Skills:
Extensive experience in Python and Java
Proficient with NLP libraries and tools (spaCy, NLTK, Hugging Face Transformers)
Skilled in model deployment frameworks (TensorFlow Serving, MLflow, Kubernetes-based deployments)
Hands on Experience with ETL processes, data pipelines, and data warehousing solutions
Expertise with top-tier datastores (MongoDB, AWS DocumentDB, SQL Server, MySQL)
Proficient in Linux
Experience with Apache Tomcat, Nginx, AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI)
Understanding of container orchestration tools and concepts
Knowledge of security best practices in cloud and distributed applications
Experience with infrastructure as code (IaC) tools (Terraform, CloudFormation).
Join us to be part of an innovative team and make a significant impact on our AI-driven future!
#LI-AK

job_details.title: Generative AI Intern
job_details.description:
We are looking for a motivated Generative AI Intern with a strong foundation in Python and Generative AI concepts. The intern will work closely with our technical team to build, experiment, and optimize GenAI-powered solutions, including large language models (LLMs), prompt engineering, and AI-driven applications.

This role is ideal for someone eager to gain hands-on experience with cutting-edge AI technologies in a real-world environment.

Key Responsibilities

Assist in developing and testing Generative AI applications using Python

Work with Large Language Models (LLMs) such as GPT-style models

Implement and experiment with prompt engineering techniques

Support data preprocessing, model fine-tuning, and evaluation

Build prototypes, scripts, and proof-of-concept AI solutions

Collaborate with team members to integrate GenAI features into applications

Document learnings, experiments, and code clearly

Required Skills & Qualifications

Strong knowledge of Python programming

Basic understanding of Generative AI and LLMs

Familiarity with concepts like:

Prompt engineering

Transformers (basic understanding)

Text generation, summarization, or chatbots

Experience with libraries or tools such as:

OpenAI APIs / Hugging Face (preferred)

NumPy, Pandas (basic level)

Good problem-solving and analytical skills

Ability to learn quickly and work independently

job_details.description:
Do you want to help solve the world's most pressing challengesFeeding the world's growing population and slowing climate change are two of the world's greatest challenges
AGCO is a part of the solution! Join us to make your contribution
AGCO is looking to hire candidates for the position of Generative AI Developer
The ideal Generative AI Developer will have a strong background in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and deep learning, with a specific focus on generative models
As a Generative AI Developer, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and deploying generative AI models to create innovative solutions and enhance our product offerings, customer, dealer and employee experience
This role is responsible for researching and implementing state-of-the-art generative models and collaborating closely with data scientists, AI engineers, and other cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into AI-driven solutions
This work will involve developing and fine-tuning models, conducting effective search and summary, and evaluating model performance to ensure high-quality outputs
The Generative AI Developer will also stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in generative AI, machine learning, and deep learning, ensuring that our methodologies and tools remain cutting-edge
The ability to communicate findings and insights through reports, presentations, and demonstrations will be essential in driving informed decision-making and showcasing the potential of generative AI within the organization
Your Impact
Research, design, and implement state-of-the-art generative AI model based solutions
Develop and fine-tune models to generate high-quality outputs for various applications
Conduct experiments and evaluate model performance to ensure accuracy and reliability of GenAI output
Collaborate with data scientists, AI developers, and cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and provide AI-driven solutions
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in generative AI, machine learning, and deep learning
Communicate findings and insights through reports, presentations, and demonstrations
Ensure the scalability and efficiency of generative AI models in production environments

Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field
Minimum 7+yrs of relevant experience
Proven experience as an AI Developer or in a similar role, with a focus on generative models
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, and experience with deep learning frameworks (e g, TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Strong knowledge of generative models (e g, GANs, VAEs, autoregressive models) and their applications

Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail

job_details.title: AI ML Developer
job_details.description:
Company
Siemens Energy Industrial Turbomachinery India Private Limited
Organization
Transformation of Industry
Business Unit
Compression
Full / Part time
Full-time
Experience Level
Experienced Professional
A Snapshot of Your Day:

Join a forward-thinking team dedicated to harnessing the transformative power of AI within the energy sector. As an AI/ML Engineer, you will proactively lead the design and delivery of sophisticated, scalable, and resilient Generative AI based solutions on Cloud Based platform, driving the energy transformation and advancing Siemens Energys strategic goals.

In this role, youll write code, test, and deploy advanced AI applications, in addition to building machine learning models, creating programming interfaces, and making them accessible to existing software!

How You ll Make an Impact:
Partner with developers in Agile teams to merge LLMs and classical AI into end-user apps, emphasizing user experience and real-time performance.
Customize LLMs: Tailor pre-trained models to meet business needs using timely engineering, transfer learning, and few-shot methods.
Data Hygiene: Collect, clean, and preprocess large datasets to ensure high-quality input for AI models.
Model Validation & Reporting: Measure and validate the performance of AI models using appropriate metrics. Document AI models, algorithms, and processes, and communicate findings and results to stakeholders.
Integration: Integrate external knowledge sources including databases, APIs and document repositories to enrich LLM with real time or domain specific information
Collaboration : Work with data scientists, software engineers, and product managers to integrate AI solutions into products and services
What You Bring:
Bachelor s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
2-4 years of experience in software development with AI-based applications.
2+ years of experience with Python with hands-on experience in machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn.

job_details.title: Data Scientist
job_details.description:
About the role:

DNV is the worlds largest ship classification society with a global presence. DNV is a self-owned foundation, with the purpose of safeguarding life, property, and the environment.  DNV has high ambitions for improving business processes and services by using AI. DNV is now establishing an AI team in Pune to strengthen DNV’s ability to meet ambitious business goals.
You will be part of a leading AI competency and development team located at the two locations Pune and Oslo (DNV headquarters). The AI team focuses on use of AI and machine learning to improve DNV’s maritime global work processes.  We create AI systems that enable and support digitalization of DNV’s global production processes and systems as well as creation of new digital services. The AI team consists of experienced data scientists and software developers. You will collaborate in teams with different functional competencies and domain experts. Our deliveries have a global impact through our multi-national organization, and through cooperation with large companies.




Daily tasks / duties:
You will solve real-world business cases and be a key contributor to programming and releasing AI and Machine Learning solutions. You will engage in all project phases, from dialogue with stakeholders to understand the problem to be solved, through data analysis, planning technical architecture and team collaboration on experimenting, programming and releasing solutions through our DevOps cycles to production. You are also expected to actively explore new opportunities for applied AI, to stay up-to-dated with main trends in the AI industry, and to identify how AI may create new business opportunities for DNV. 


What we offer:

Flexible work arrangements for better work-life balance 
Generous Paid Leaves (Annual, Sick, Compassionate, Local Public, Marriage, Maternity, Paternity, Medical leave)
Medical benefits ( Insurance and Annual Health Check-up)
Pension and Insurance Policies (Group Term Life Insurance, Group Personal Accident Insurance, Travel Insurance)
Training and Development Assistance (Training Sponsorship, On-The-Job Training, Training Programme) 
Additional Benefits (Long Service Awards, Mobile Phone Reimbursement)
Company bonus/Profit share.
You will be part of a strong, international data science team continuously delivering value-adding AI solutions that are integrated into business applications and work       processes.
You will collaborate with experienced data scientist experts across the two locations Pune and Oslo
You will collaborate in cross-functional teams with skilled developers, data engineers and domain experts
You enjoy teamwork and you take a holistic view of projects and tasks.
You are self-driven and take ownership of the solutions success and value-creation You enjoy seeing your real-world AI solutions come to life, being integrated into tools applications and work processes.



*Benefits may vary based on position, tenure/contract/grade level*




DNV is an Equal Opportunity Employer and gives consideration for employment to qualified applicants without regard to gender, religion, race, national or ethnic origin, cultural background, social group, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, age or political opinion. Diversity is fundamental to our culture and we invite you to be part of this diversity.




About you:

2–10 years of experience in AI programming
Master’s degree or higher in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or a related field
Proven experience in practical AI development and integration into business applications
Expertise in Python and strong knowledge of Machine Learning techniques
Working knowledge of Git and Docker
Familiarity with DevOps concepts and processes
Strong verbal and written communication skills in English
Knowledge of Deep Learning and transformer architectures (preferred)
Experience in systematic evaluation and testing of AI solutions
Passion for learning new technologies and staying updated on industry trends
Ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams
Result-oriented mindset with strong problem-solving skills
Curiosity and eagerness to understand customer needs



Security and compliance with statutory requirements in the countries in which we operate is essential for DNV. Background checks will be conducted on all final candidates as part of the offer process, in accordance with applicable country-specific laws and practices.

job_details.title: Agentic AI Developer
job_details.description:
Capgemini is hiring for Agentic AI Developer role




Locations: Mumbai/ Pune/Chennai/Hyderabad/Noida/Gurugram

Work mode: Hybrid

Experience range: 2 years to 6 years

Job Description

We are looking for a Agentic AI Developer with 2+ years of hands-on experience in designing, developing, and deploying intelligent, autonomous AI agents that can plan, reason, and act toward achieving complex goals. This role blends expertise in Generative AI, Large Language Models (LLMs), and orchestration frameworks to build systems that go beyond static responsesenabling dynamic, goal-driven behavior.

Key responsibilities

Build autonomous agents using frameworks like LangChain, LangGraph, AutoGen, and CrewAI that can plan, reason, and execute tasks iteratively.
Integrate and fine-tune LLMs (e.g., GPT, Claude, LLaMA) for use in agent workflows, including prompt engineering and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).
Develop systems where multiple agents collaborate, delegate tasks, and adapt strategies based on real-time feedback.
Enable agents to interact with external systems (e.g., APIs, databases, web apps) to perform actions autonomously.
Use tools like LangSmith, Grafana, and Splunk to monitor agent behavior, performance, and reliability.
Work closely with data scientists, architects, and product teams to align agentic solutions with business goals.
Ensure all solutions are well-documented and comply with data privacy and security standards.

Technical Skills

Languages: Python (mandatory), JavaScript, C# (optional)
Frameworks: LangChain, LangGraph, AutoGen, CrewAI, Hugging Face Transformers
LLMs: GPT-4, GPT- 4o, Claude, LLaMA, Mistral, Gemini
Vector Databases: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB, Weaviate
Cloud Platforms: Azure (OpenAI, ML Studio), AWS (Bedrock, SageMaker), GCP (Vertex AI)
DevOps & CI/CD: Git, Azure DevOps, Docker, Kubernetes
Monitoring Tools: LangSmith, Grafana, Splunk
Other Tools: Streamlit, FastAPI, Flask for UI/API development

Qualifications

Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or related field
213 years of experience in AI/ML development, with at least 12 years in Gen AI or Agentic AI
Strong understanding of autonomous systems, planning algorithms, and multi-agent coordination
Excellent problem-solving, communication, and collaboration skills

About the Team


We re a builder team at Pattern that ships products to streamline operations and open new markets. We move quickly, iterate directly with users, and give engineers real autonomy and ownership. AI is part of our daily toolkit used to speed up product management, elevate experience design, and increase engineering velocity. We share what works and continually raise the bar together.
The Role
We re looking for a Senior Software Engineer who enjoys building innovative, scalable solutions for ambiguous problems. You ll work across the stack, collaborate with product and design, and own projects from architecture through launch and iteration.
Problem Spaces You May Work In
You won t be limited to a single domain. Recent and ongoing initiatives include:
Short-Form Video Intelligence & Creative Tooling -Analyze patterns in social video and power data-driven creative workflows (insight extraction, content scoring, generation pipelines).
Marketplace Content Optimization at Scale -Synthesize/enrich product listings, normalize attributes and taxonomies, and enable rapid experimentation to improve conversion.
Applied Automation & Robotics Enablement - Connect perception, workflow orchestration, and operator tools to improve reliability and throughput in physical operations.
AI Platform & Agentic Workflows - Retrieval, evaluation, guardrails, and observability services that integrate AI deeply into product experiences with the right cost/latency/quality trade-offs.

Design, build, and operate production systems with clear interfaces, tests, and observability.
Partner directly with users and stakeholders to validate value and iterate quickly.
Apply AI thoughtfully to accelerate development and improve outcomes, and share your approach with the team.
Make pragmatic architecture decisions and own projects end-to-end.


What We re Looking For
Senior-level experience delivering and operating production software (typically 4+ years).
Strong backend skills (APIs, data modeling, cloud services) and comfort working across the stack.
Product mindset: bias to action, care for UX, reliability, and maintainability.
Curiosity and sound judgment in applying AI to real workflows.

job_details.title: Lead Generative AI Engineer
job_details.description:
Were looking for an Azure-first AI Engineer with 6-8 years’ experience to design, ship, and operate production-grade LLM and ML solutions on Microsoft Azure. You will build secure, scalable apps leveraging Azure OpenAI Service, Azure Machine Learning, Azure AI Search (vector), Document Intelligence, and AI Studio/Prompt Flow, integrating with enterprise data, MLOps, and governance guardrails. You’ll partner with product, data, and platform teams to turn




Key Responsibilities

Translate business problems into AI solutions, define acceptance criteria, and deliver iteratively with Product, Architecture, and Data Engineering teams.
Build LLM-powered applications (chat, copilots, content generation, workflow assistants) using Azure OpenAI (GPT family, embeddings) with Prompt Flow/AI Studio for orchestration.
Implement RAG pipelines: document ingestion, chunking, vector indexing on Azure AI Search, hybrid semantic+keyword retrieval, reranking, and grounding with enterprise sources (SharePoint/Blob/Cosmos/SQL).
Integrate Azure Cognitive Services (Document Intelligence, Vision, Speech, Translator) to enrich multimodal solutions.
Develop secure APIs/services (FastAPI/Flask/.NET/Node) and frontends integrating Entra ID (Azure AD) authentication.
Operationalize models on Azure ML (managed endpoints/AKS), establish model registries, automated CI/CD via Azure DevOps, tracking with MLflow, and blue/green/Canary deployments.
Implement observability & evaluation: telemetry (App Insights), offline/online eval, safety metrics, drift detection, human-in-the-loop review, and continuous prompt/model optimization.
Ensure cost governance (quotas, rate limits, token budgets), scalability (GPU/CPU pools, autoscaling), and performance SLAs.
Apply Responsible AI guardrails: input/output filtering, PII/PHI detection, content safety, red-teaming, and risk assessments.
Create technical design docs, architecture diagrams, runbooks, and handover artifacts.

Required Technical Qualifications;

Programming: Strong Python; familiarity with TypeScript/Node or C# is a plus.
Azure AI: Hands-on with Azure OpenAI, Azure AI Studio/Prompt Flow, Azure AI Search (vector), Azure Document Intelligence, Azure ML (training, managed endpoints), AKS/ACI, Functions, Event Grid.
RAG & LLM Tools: Practical experience with LangChain/LlamaIndex (Azure toolchains), embeddings, retrieval evaluation, and prompt engineering.
Data & Integration: Working knowledge of Azure Blob/Data Lake, Cosmos DB/SQL, Data Factory/Synapse; designing pipelines for ingestion and ETL/ELT.
MLOps: CI/CD on Azure DevOps, experiment tracking (MLflow), model governance, monitoring/alerting (App Insights/Azure Monitor).

Familiarity with vector DBs (e.g., Pinecone/Weaviate) and hybrid retrieval strategies; Hugging Face ecosystems; finetuning SLMs/LLMs where appropriate.

job_details.title: Senior AI Engineer LLM & Agent Design
job_details.description:
Location: Bangalore, Pune, Hyderabad


Experience: 6 - 9 Years


CTC: 18 - 24 LPA


Notice Period: Immediate to 15 Days




Role Overview

We are seeking a Senior AI Engineer LLM & Agent Design to architect, build, and scale production-grade intelligent agents for enterprise and BFSI use cases. This role focuses on LLM-powered agentic systems, memory management, Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), and robust AI workflows deployed in real-world environments.

You will work at the intersection of advanced AI research and enterprise engineering, collaborating with Product, Data, and Platform teams to deliver secure, scalable, and responsible AI solutions. Your work will directly influence how intelligent automation, copilots, and enterprise assistants are designed and deployed at scale.




Key Responsibilities

LLM Agent Architecture & Design

Architect and develop LLM-powered agents with advanced:

Tool and function calling

Planning and decision-making

Multi-turn reasoning and state management

Design agentic systems with orchestration logic and autonomous execution.

Build multi-agent systems, planners, and collaborative agent frameworks.


Memory Systems & Context Management

Design and implement short-term and long-term memory architectures.

Build vector stores, episodic memory, and semantic memory pipelines.

Optimize context windows, memory schemas, and retrieval relevance.

Implement memory graphs and knowledge retention strategies for agents.


Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)

Design and operationalize RAG pipelines for enterprise knowledge access.

Implement:

Document chunking and indexing strategies

Retrieval pipelines and context injection

Embedding generation and similarity search

Optimize RAG performance for latency, accuracy, and cost.

Build evaluation frameworks for grounding, factuality, and relevance (BLEU/ROUGE, custom metrics).


End-to-End AI Engineering & MLOps

Own the AI engineering lifecycle:

Data pipelines

Model integration

Evaluation and validation

Deployment and monitoring

Build CI/CD pipelines for LLM applications and agent workflows.

Manage model versioning, experiment tracking, and rollback strategies.

Implement observability using logging, metrics, and tracing (Prometheus/OpenTelemetry).


Production Readiness & Responsible AI

Optimize cost, latency, throughput, and reliability of LLM systems.

Implement guardrails, safety mechanisms, and hallucination mitigation.

Ensure data privacy, PII handling, and regulatory compliance, especially for BFSI use cases.

Drive adoption of responsible and ethical AI practices.


Collaboration & Leadership

Work closely with Product, Data, Platform, and Security teams.

Mentor junior engineers and provide technical leadership.

Define best practices, coding standards, and design guidelines for LLM and agent engineering.

Contribute to architectural decisions and long-term AI strategy.


You Might Be Our Ideal Match If You:

Experience & Core Skills

Have 7–8 years of experience in software and AI engineering.

Possess 3+ years of hands-on experience with LLMs and agent frameworks.

Are highly proficient in Python (mandatory).

Have working experience in TypeScript, Java, or Go (good to have).


LLM & Agent Frameworks

Experience with LangChain, LlamaIndex, DSPy, OpenAI Assistants, Semantic Kernel, AgentQL.

Strong understanding of:

Tool calling and function calling

Agent orchestration and planning

Prompt design, chaining, and optimization


Vector Databases & RAG

Expertise in FAISS, Pinecone, Weaviate, Milvus.

Strong understanding of:

Embedding models

Similarity search and indexing strategies

Vector optimization and retrieval tuning

Deep knowledge of RAG architectures and evaluation.


Cloud, MLOps & Observability

Hands-on experience with AWS, Azure, or GCP.

Experience building CI/CD pipelines for ML/LLM systems.

Knowledge of:

Model versioning and experiment tracking

Observability tools (Prometheus, logging, tracing)

Familiarity with microservices and distributed systems.

Fine-tuning techniques (LoRA, PEFT, distillation, quantization).

Multi-agent collaboration and coordination strategies.

Memory graphs and knowledge graphs.

Event-driven architectures and streaming systems.

Message queues (Kafka, Redis).

Experience deploying AI copilots or enterprise assistants in production.

Proven experience running LLM applications at scale.

job_details.title: Senior AI Engineer
job_details.description:
Rockwell Automation is a global technology leader focused on helping the world s manufacturers be more productive, sustainable, and agile. With more than 28,000 employees who make the world better every day, we know we have something special. Behind our customers - amazing companies that help feed the world, provide life-saving medicine on a global scale, and focus on clean water and green mobility - our people are energized problem solvers that take pride in how the work we do changes the world for the better.

We welcome all makers, forward thinkers, and problem solvers who are looking for a place to do their best work. And if that s you we would love to have you join us!

Job Description

Senior AI Engineer

Location: Pune / Noida / Bengaluru, India (Hybrid)

As an AI Engineer, you will contribute to the design, development, and deployment of enterprise-grade artificial intelligence solutions that drive innovation and deliver measurable business value. You will work closely with cross-functional teams including data scientists, software engineers, and partners to build scalable, secure, and ethically responsible AI systems.

You will report to TECHNICAL LEADER - AI

Your Responsibilities:
Develop AI Solutions: Build and implement AI models and pipelines that integrate with existing IT and data infrastructure, ensuring performance, scalability, and maintainability.
Collaborate Across Teams: Work with data scientists, engineers, and business teams throughout the AI solution lifecycle from ideation and prototyping to deployment and monitoring.
Technology Evaluation: Explore and recommend AI/ML frameworks, platforms, and tools (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, cloud AI services) that align with project goals and technical feasibility.
Follow Best Practices: Apply standards for model development, testing, deployment, and lifecycle management, with a focus on ethical AI and data privacy compliance.
Support and Learn: Receive mentorship from senior AI leaders while contributing to the organizations AI strategy and adoption.

The Essentials You Will Have:

Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
5+ years of experience developing and deploying AI/ML models in production environments.
Hands-on experience with frameworks and tools such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Scikit-learn, and cloud-based AI services (e.g., AWS SageMaker, Azure ML).
Strong programming skills in Python, R, Java, or similar languages.
Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software engineering principles.
Exposure to cross-functional collaboration and delivering AI solutions that support business outcomes.

The Preferred You Might Also Have:

Experience deploying AI models on cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) in hybrid or multi-cloud setups.
Familiarity with MLOps practices for continuous integration, deployment, and monitoring.
Ability to translate business requirements into scalable technical solutions.
Interest in mentoring and growing within AI or data science teams.

What We Offer:

Our benefits package includes

Comprehensive mindfulness programs with a premium membership to Calm
Volunteer Paid Time off available after 6 months of employment for eligible employees
Company volunteer and donation matching program Your volunteer hours or personal cash donations to an eligible charity can be matched with a charitable donation.
Employee Assistance Program
Personalized wellbeing programs through our OnTrack program
On-demand digital course library for professional development

... and other local benefits!

At Rockwell Automation we are dedicated to building a diverse, inclusive and authentic workplace, so if youre excited about this role but your experience doesnt align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyway. You may be just the right person for this or other roles.

#LI-KV1

#LI-Hybrid

Rockwell Automation s hybrid policy aligns that employees are expected to work at a Rockwell location at least Mondays, Tuesdays, and Thursdays unless they have a business obligation out of the office.
